DOC.brief_summary: This trial multi-center , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel , phase II clinical trial aim osteoarthritis knee . Patients sign informed consent voluntarily eligible study assign randomly one 3 group 2 week-Washout period . 1. st group ( experimental ) : WIN-34B 450mg BID 2. nd group ( experimental ) : WIN-34B 900mg BID 3. rd group ( Comparator ) : Placebo BID Patients take WIN-34B Placebo BID 12 week . Based baseline , 4 week ( Visit 3 ) 12 week ( Visit 5 ) , Researchers check patient ' physical examination , questionnaire , laboratory experiment . After 8 week ( Visit 4 ) , researcher check adverse effect current medication status via telephone interview . After 12 week ( Visit 5 ) patient stop take drug 16 week ( Visit 6 ) researcher check patient ' physical examination , questionnaire , adverse effect current medication status .
DOC.brief_title: A 12 Week , Phase II Trial Evaluate Efficacy Safety WIN-34B Patients With Osteoarthritis Knee
DOC.criteria: 1 . Being 35 80 year age 2 . Diagnosed Osteoarthritis knee least 3 month 3 . Diagnosed Osteoarthritis knee , base ACR criterion 4 . Able communicate researcher write questionnaire 5 . At screen visit , check 100mm Pain VAS least 80mm 6 . At randomization ( Visit 2 ) , check 100mm Pain VAS 50mm 7 . Agreeing participate signing inform consent voluntarily 1 . Previous intraarticular injection knee within 3 month 2 . Previous knee surgery within 6 month schedule procedure 3 . Other disease could affect interfere therapeutic outcome 4 . Experiencing habitual use psychotropic , narcotic analgesic drug 1 week 5 . Diagnosed gastrointestinal disease , unable stop medicine study 6 . At screen visit , identify liver dysfunction 7 . At screen visit , identify renal dysfunction 8 . Patients take NSAIDs 9 . Pregnancy breastfeeding ( woman childbearing age need pregnancy test ) 10 . Physicological mental disorder , include drugtakers 11 . Orthopedic disease could affect interfere therapeutic outcome 12 . Inappropriate study
